pageContext.claim: “I think it's very important [in the Census] -- to find out if somebody is a citizen as opposed to an illegal? I think there's a big difference, to me, between being a citizen of the United States and being an illegal.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a big contradiction. The Trump administration spent more than a year arguing in courts that it needed to add a Census citizenship question to improve enforcement of the Voting Rights Act. But Trump now says the purpose was to determine how many undocumented immigrants reside in the country.
